chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: My order is delayed and I can't see where the package is located. Actually, I need the device by tomorrow and I'm worried that it won't arrive on time. Can you understand how long it will take? Best regards.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

lost.


Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner regarding this issue. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
CH
